933:7: jagāma duḥkhena vigāhamāno jalāgame strota ivāpagāyāḥ||3||
933:8: atho mahadbhiḥ pati saṃpatadbhiḥ saṃpūjyamānāya tathāgatāya|
933:9: karttuṃ praṇāmaṃ na śaśāka nandastenābhireme tu gurormahimnā||4||
933:10: svaṃ cāvasaṅgaṃ pathi nirmumukṣurbhaktiṃ janasyānyamateśva rakṣan|
933:11: nandaṃ ca gehābhimukhaṃ jighṛkṣan mārgaṃ tato'nyaṃ sugataḥ prapede||5||
933:12: tato viviktaṃ ca viviktacetāḥ sanmārgavin mārgamabhipratasthe|
933:18: tatsādhu sāhupriya mattpriyārtham tatrāstu bhikṣūttama bhaikṣakālaḥ|
933:19: asau hi madhyaṃ nabhaso yiyāsuḥ kālaṃ pratismārayatīva sūryaḥ||9||
933:21: tādṛṅ nimittaṃ sugataścakāra nāhārakṛtyaṃ sa yathā viveda||10||
933:22: tataḥ sa kṛtvā munaye praṇāmaṃ gṛhaprayāṇāya matiṃ cakāra|
933:23: anugrahārthaṃ sugatastu tasmai pātraṃ dadau puraṣkarapatranetraḥ||11||
933:24: tataḥ sa loke dadataḥ phalārthaṃ pātrasya tasyāpratimasya pātram|
933:28: bhāryānurāgeṇa yadā gṛhaṃ sa pātraṃ gṛhītvā'pi yiyāsureva|
933:30: nirmokṣabījaṃ hi dadarśa tasya jñānaṃ mṛdu kleśarajaśca tīvram|
933:31: kleśānukūlaṃ viṣayātmakaṃ ca nandaṃ yatastaṃ munirācakarṣa||15||
933:36: nandaḥ sa ca pratyayaneyacetā yaṃ śiśriye tanmayatāmavāpa|
933:37: yasmādimaṃ tatra cakāra yannaṃ taṃ snehapaṅkān munirujjihīrṣan||18||
933:43: kareṇa cakrāṅkatalena mūrdhni pasparśa caivedamuvāca cainam||21||
933:44: yāvanna hiṃsraḥ samupaiti kālaḥ śamāya tāvat kuru saumya buddhim|
933:47: havyairivāgneḥ pavaneritasya lokasya kāmairna hi tṛptirasti||23||
933:50: hitasya vaktā pravaraḥ suhṛdbhyo dharmāya khedo guṇavān śramebhyaḥ|
933:51: jñānāya kṛtyaṃ paramaṃ kriyābhyaḥ kimindriyāṇāmupagamya dāsyam||25||
933:54: jarāsamā nāstyamṛjā prajānāṃ vyādheḥ samo nāsti jagatyanarthaḥ|
933:55: mṛtyoḥ samaṃ nāsti bhayaṃ pṛthivyāmetattrayaṃ khalvavaśena sevyam||27||
933:56: snehena kaścinna samo'sti pāśaḥ sroto na tṛṣṇāsamamasti hāri|
933:57: rāgāgninā nāsti samastathāgnistaccet trayaṃ nāsti sukhaṃ ca te'sti ||28||
933:60: prajñāmayaṃ varma badhāna tasmānno kṣāntinighnasya hi śokabāṇāḥ|
933:62: yathauṣadhairhastagataiḥ savidyo na daśyate kaścana pannagena|
933:64: āsthāya yogaṃ parigamya tattvaṃ na trāsamāgacchati mṛtyukāle|
933:65: ābaddhavarmā sudhanuḥ kṛtāsro jigīṣayā śūra ivāhavasthaḥ||32||
933:67: dhṛṣṭaṃ girāntarhṛdayena sīdaṃstatheti nandaḥ sugataṃ babhāṣe||33||
933:68: atha pramādācca tamujjihīrṣan matvāgamasyaiva ca pātrabhūtam|
933:72: śrutvātha nandasya manīṣitaṃ tad buddhāya vaidehamuniḥ śaśaṃsa|
933:73: saṃśrutya tasmādapi tasya bhāvaṃ mahāmunirnandamuvāca bhūyaḥ||36||
933:75: jñātīṃśca dṛṣṭvā vratino gṛhasthān saṃvinna kiṃ te'sti na vāsti cetaḥ||37||
933:76: rājarṣayaste viditā na nūnaṃ vanāni ye śiśriyire hasantaḥ|
933:77: niṣṭhīvya kāmānupaśāntikāmāḥ kāmeṣu naivaṃ kṛpaṇeṣu saktāḥ||38||
933:78: bhūyaḥ samālokya gṛheṣu doṣān niśāmya tattyāgakṛtaṃ ca śarma|
933:79: naivāsti moktuṃ matirālayaṃ te deśaṃ mumūrṣoriva sopasargam||39||
933:80: saṃsārakāntāraparāyaṇasya śive kathaṃ te pathi nārurukṣā|
933:81: āropyamāṇasya tameva mārgaṃ bhraṣṭasya sārthādiva sārthikasya||40||
933:82: yaḥ sarvato veśmani dahyamāne śayīta mohānna tato vyapeyāt|
933:83: kālāgninā vyādhijarāśikhena loke pradīpte sa bhavet pramattaḥ||41||
933:84: praṇīyamānaśca yathā vadhāya matto hasecca pralapecca vadhyaḥ|
933:85: mṛtyau tathā tiṣṭhati pāśahaste śocyaḥ pramādyan viparitacetāḥ||42||
933:86: yadā narendrāśca kuṭumbinaśca vihāya bandhūṃśca parigrahāṃśca|
933:87: yayuśca yāsyanti ca yānti caiva priyeṣvanityeṣu kuto'nurodhaḥ||43||
933:88: kiñcinna paśyāmi ratasya yatra tadanyabhāvena bhavenna duḥkham|
933:89: tasmāt kvacinna kṣamate prasaktiryadi kṣamastadvigamānna śokaḥ||44||
933:90: tatsaumya lolaṃ parigamya lokaṃ māyopamaṃ citramivendrajālam|
933:91: priyābhidhānaṃ tyaja mohajālaṃ chettuṃ matiste yadi duḥkhajālam||45||
933:92: varaṃ hitodarkamāniṣṭamannaṃ na svādu yat syādahitānubaddham|
933:93: yasmādahaṃ tvāṃ viniyojayāmi śive śucau vartmani vipriye'pi||46||
933:95: tathojjihīrṣuḥ khalu rāgaśalyaṃ tattvāmavocaṃ paruṣaṃ hitāya||47||
933:99: yāvadvayo yogavidhau samarthaṃ buddhiṃ kuru śreyasi tāvadeva||49||
933:100: ityevamuktaḥ sa vināyakena hitaiṣiṇā kāruṇikena nandaḥ|
933:101: kartāsmi sarvaṃ bhagavan vacaste tathā yathājñāpayasītyuvāca||50||
933:104: atho nataṃ tasya mukhaṃ sabāṣpaṃ pravāsyamāneṣu śiroruheṣu|
933:107: pūrṇaḥ śaśī bahulapakṣagataḥ kṣapānte bālātapena pariṣikta ivāvabhāse||53||
933:108: saundarananda kāvye “nanda-dīkṣā“ nāma pañcama sarga samāpta|
